code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'../App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const USERS={Admin:'Admin123',Testownik:'Testownik123'};export default function Login(_ref){let{onLogin}=_ref;const[name,setName]=useState('');const[pass,setPass]=useState('');const[err,setErr]=useState(null);const submit=()=>{if(USERS[name]===pass)onLogin(name);else setErr('Błędne dane');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container login-panel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Logowanie"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"Dost\u0119pni u\u017Cytkownicy:"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["U\u017Cytkownik: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"Admin"})," Has\u0142o: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"Admin123"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["U\u017Cytkownik: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"Testownik"})," Has\u0142o: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"Testownik123"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Nazwa",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Has\u0142o",value:pass,onChange:e=>setPass(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",onClick:submit,children:"Zaloguj"}),err&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:'tomato'},children:err})]});}
